Text: Re HILCORP old ocean volume Cc the same gas that was going through before we did the Hilcorp deal According to Brad the line is piggable Edward D Gottlob AM To Mary Jo CT cc Daren J CT Gerard NRON Jill T CT James CT Lauri A CT Linda nron George CT Vance L CT Subject Re HILCORP old ocean volume Are we going to have some quality problems with this gas EDG To Daren J CT Gerard NRON Jill T CT James CT Edward D CT Lauri A CT cc Linda nron George CT Vance L CT Subject Re HILCORP old ocean volume Well I have officially NOT heard from Hilcorp after numerous voice and email messages Please plan to have the gas rerouted back down the valley line for the Dec forward Call if you have any questions Daren J Farmer AM To Mary Jo CT cc Subject Re HILCORP old ocean volume Thanks for the info I appreciated the call the other day It really helps me out to recieve info early like that D From Mary Jo Johnson PM To Daren J CT James CT Gary A CT cc Jill T CT Subject HILCORP old ocean volume According to Gary Hanks we would like to have the gas on the valley line anyway Forwarded by Mary Jo JohnsonHOUECT on PM To Jill T CT cc Edward D CT Lauri A CT Subject Re Producer service group I can not believe you are sending emails form Hawaii You are crazy I took care of Camden for the month It is now and Hilcorp has not responded I spoke with Jerry Bubert several times today emailed Mike LAnnou and left messages and had him paged and copied Hildebrand the president If we dont hear by pm we are supposed to bypass the gas

Re Driscoll Ranch Gas pricing and interconnect estimatethat is what I said Daren J Farmer PM To Mary Jo CT cc Subject Re Driscoll Ranch Gas pricing and interconnect estimate The notice should be given on Monday the th by pm D From Mary Jo Johnson AM To Daren J CT cc Subject Re Driscoll Ranch Gas pricing and interconnect estimate Can you help me out on this Darren MJJ Forwarded by Mary Jo JohnsonHOUECT on AM John Daugherty on PM To cc Subject Re Driscoll Ranch Gas pricing and interconnect estimate Mary Jo Thanks for the update Regarding the notice provision of business days prior to the close of business on the last business day of the month prior to selected month does that mean we need to give you notice for December by Tuesday November st at PM or Monday November th at PM assuming the rd and th are holidays John Daugherty Original Message From To Cc Sent Wednesday November PM Subject Re Driscoll Ranch Gas pricing and interconnect estimate

Re Driscoll Ranch Gas pricing and interconnect estimateyou help me out on this Darren MJJ Forwarded by Mary Jo JohnsonHOUECT on AM John Daugherty on PM To cc Subject Re Driscoll Ranch Gas pricing and interconnect estimate Mary Jo Thanks for the update Regarding the notice provision of business days prior to the close of business on the last business day of the month prior to selected month does that mean we need to give you notice for December by Tuesday November st at PM or Monday November th at PM assuming the rd and th are holidays John Daugherty Original Message From To Cc Sent Wednesday November PM Subject Re Driscoll Ranch Gas pricing and interconnect estimate
meter MustangEagle common pointat the meter should be about day more than was listed on the nomination for the month of September MJJ

Hilcorp Old Ocean Cc continued the Hilcorp Old Ocean deal Dan Hyvl is writing up the contracts for me and they should be ready Monday Terms are as follows Sept Nov IFHSC Gas Daily for any mid month turn on as in our purchase contracts Letter of credit must be approved prior to Sept they said they will have it Monday by pm volume minmax is day day with same tolerance currently existing for swingwe expect to level out around d Please call if you have any concerns as we will continue this gas flow without interruption Thanks Mary Jo Johnson

Letter of Credit Format Cc Forwarded by Mary Jo JohnsonHOUECT on AM From Russell Diamond AM To cc Mary Jo CT Brad nron Subject Letter of Credit Format Mike Please see the attached LC format to cover physical delivery of natural gas for one month As discussed the LC amount should be million to expire Oct In addition the LC should be in the name of Hilcorp Energy Company I also left you an additional voice mail stating that once we have received a faxed copy of the LC from your bank we will then be willing to flow gas Regards Russell

need contractam trying to get a contract together for a wellhead purchase from Hydrocarbon Lease Mgmt I will be buying the gas in the name of ENA and selling into NGPL Can we do a form contract year What type do you typically use GISB Please let me know when I can visit with you today on this Thanks MJJ

Hilcorp Old Ocean Cc continued the Hilcorp Old Ocean deal Dan Hyvl is writing up the contracts for me and they should be ready Monday Terms are as follows Sept Nov IFHSC Gas Daily for any mid month turn on as in our purchase contracts Letter of credit must be approved prior to Sept they said they will have it Monday by pm volume minmax is day day with same tolerance currently existing for swingwe expect to level out around d Please call if you have any concerns as we will continue this gas flow without interruption Thanks Mary Jo Johnson

need new contractthe Hydrocarbon lease GTC I need another one for Niemerg Gas Company East Jefferson Avenue Effingham Il state of incorporationIllinois phone fax Tax Id contact Brent Holmes Heller Holmes Associates PC A Professional Corporation Broadway PO Box Matoon Illinois fax Sept NGPL meter pricing will be Gas Dailydaily indx NGPL IowaIllinois less I will confirm pricing before the contract goes out

need new contractto Niemerg address contract and notifictions to Brent Holmes fax number is I had nominations to be made by Harold Allen phone office please have the same notification of nom changes to Jessica White as in other contract Forwarded by Mary Jo JohnsonHOUECT on PM From Mary Jo Johnson PM To Dan J CT cc Subject need new contract remember the Hydrocarbon lease GTC I need another one for Niemerg Gas Company East Jefferson Avenue Effingham Il state of incorporationIllinois phone fax Tax Id contact Brent Holmes Heller Holmes Associates PC A Professional Corporation Broadway PO Box Matoon Illinois fax Sept NGPL meter pricing will be Gas Dailydaily indx NGPL IowaIllinois less I will confirm pricing before the contract goes out
